patthana17.30:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.30:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, sahajāte cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.30:2.1_0: Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.30:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi …pe… upanissaye purejāte nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana17.30:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.30:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
